thag5.6:1.1: It was truly for my benefit
thag5.6:1.2: that the Buddha went to the river Nerañjara.
thag5.6:2.1: I used to perform a diverse spectrum of sacrifices;
thag5.6:2.4: I was a blind, ordinary person.
thag5.6:3.1: Caught in the thicket of wrong view,
thag5.6:4.3: I serve the truly worthy flame:
thag5.6:4.4: I bow to the Realized One.
thag5.6:5.2: craving for continued existence is shattered;
thag5.6:5.4: now there are no more future lives.
